name: Ordinary Safe
description:
Ever wondered what Elite Dangerous would be if it was a twin-stick-shooter and made in under a week for a game jam?

Me neither, but hey, now there's a game for that!

Fly around in a perfectly crafted spaceship to shoot at other spaceships.

There's a base you should defend, as it can repair you. If it's destroyed, you're on your own.

There's 9 waves, and no indication which wave you're on. Gotta love deadlines!

Once you beat all waves, you get an unceremonious screen, and you can play again.

If you explode, it's the same deal, really. the text on the screen is a bit different though.

---

All in all, it was a tremendous fun creating this game, and I hope at least one person enjoys playing with it (apart from myself).

Credits:

Game programming by myself, 3d art by Daneeca
